node.name: XLr8 Installer
node.shortdescription: The XLr8 Installer installs files between one or more Universe or Unidata servers and accounts. A wizard guides you through the details of each action you want performed. XLr8 Installer compresses your project and stores it as an XML file. After each installation file is created you can version control it for later use and archival purposes. This is just one of the many XLr8 Tools for the above IBM databases.
